Today Ricarte Soto died. A loving hug for Cecilia, his wife. I destine your last efforts to fight for a Fund of Medicines.
The struggle of Ricarte was not in vain. The government, inspired by its example, has created a Solidarity Fund for Orphan Diseases.
This Fund. for 15 thousand MM, will benefit our children suffering from metabolic diseases, which often remained orphans of support
